qas.question: Where in Russia was Tito brought as a prisoner of war in 1918?
When was Tito brought to Russia as a prisoner of war?
How old was Pelagija Belousava when Tito met her?
How many children did Pelagija bore for Tito?
Who was the only surviving child of Tito's?

context: Tito carried on numerous affairs and was married several times. In <a1_0>1918<a1_0/> he was brought to <a0_0>Omsk<a0_0/>, Russia, as a prisoner of war. There he met Pelagija Belousova who was then <a2_0>thirteen<a2_0/>; he married her a year later, and she moved with him to Yugoslavia. Pelagija bore him <a3_0>five<a3_0/> children but only their son <a4_0>Žarko Leon<a4_0/> (born 4 February, 1924) survived. When Tito was jailed in 1928, she returned to Russia. After the divorce in 1936 she later remarried.
